amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 118-298 to increase by one year - from four years to five years - the length of time disclosures must be publicly maintained.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
